scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && copyfiles -u 0 *.png *.ico *.svg *.webmanifest master.png *.mp3 dist && javascript-obfuscator script.js --output dist/script-real.js && javascript-obfuscator regras.js --output dist/regras-real.js && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments index.html -o dist/index.html && cleancss -o dist/style.css style.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch script.js --watch regras.js --watch style.css --exec "npm run build"
scripts.up: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Update Auto" && git push && npm run deploy
